connectionEvents.description:
One or more endpoint [events](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_CreateVpcEndpointConnectionNotification.html#API_CreateVpcEndpointConnectionNotification_RequestParameters) for which to receive notifications.

> **NOTE:** One of `vpc_endpoint_service_id` or `vpc_endpoint_id` must be specified.

connectionNotificationArn.description: The ARN of the SNS topic for the notifications.

vpcEndpointId.description: The ID of the VPC Endpoint to receive notifications for.

vpcEndpointServiceId.description: The ID of the VPC Endpoint Service to receive notifications for.
